charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 1956: MONEY LAUNDERING; 18 U.S.C. 371: FAILED TO FILE THE REQUISITE CURRENCY TRANSACTION REPORT AFTER RECEIVING UNITED STATES CURRENCY FROM A CI; 31 U.S.C. 5324: WOULD AND DID CAUSE OR ATTEMPT TO CAUSE A DOMESTIC FINANCIAL INSTITUTION TO FAIL TO FILE A REPORT.

18 U.S.C. 1956: MONEY LAUNDERING; 31 U.S.C. 5324: UNLAWFULLY, WILFULLY AND KNOWINGLY, AND FOR THE PURPOSE OF EVADING THE REPORTING REQUIREMENTS OF 31 U.S.C. 5313(a), AND THE REGULATIONS PRESCRIBED THEREUNDER, WOULD AND DID CAUSE OR ATTEMPT TO CAUSE A DOMESTIC FINANCIAL INSTITUTION TO FAIL TO FILE A REPORT.

18 U.S.C. 1956: MONEY LAUNDERING; 31 U.S.C. 5324: UNLAWFULLY, WILFULLY AND KNOWINGLY, AND FOR THE PURPOSE OF EVADING THE REPORTING REQUIREMENTS OF 31 U.S.C. 5313(a), AND THE REGULATIONS PRESCRIBED THEREUNDER, WOULD AND DID CAUSE OR ATTEMPT TO CAUSE A DOMESTIC FINANCIAL INSTITUTION TO FAIL TO FILE A REPORT REQUIRED UNDER 31 U.S.C. 5313(a).
